mainboard.name: Caretaker's Talent
mainboard.oracle_text:
(Gain the next level as a sorcery to add its ability.)
Whenever one or more tokens you control enter, draw a card. This ability triggers only once each turn.
{W}: Level 2
When this Class becomes level 2, create a token that's a copy of target token you control.
{3}{W}: Level 3

mainboard.name: Esper Sentinel
mainboard.oracle_text: Whenever an opponent casts their first noncreature spell each turn, draw a card unless that player pays {X}, where X is this creature's power.

mainboard.name: Lightstall Inquisitor
mainboard.oracle_text:
Vigilance
When this creature enters, each opponent exiles a card from their hand and may play that card for as long as it remains exiled. Each spell cast this way costs {1} more to cast. Each land played this way enters tapped.

mainboard.oracle_text: Create two 1/1 white Soldier creature tokens.

mainboard.name: Soul Partition
mainboard.oracle_text: Exile target nonland permanent. For as long as that card remains exiled, its owner may play it. A spell cast by an opponent this way costs {2} more to cast.

mainboard.name: Warden of the Inner Sky
mainboard.oracle_text:
As long as this creature has three or more counters on it, it has flying and vigilance.

sideboard.name: Abundant Harvest
sideboard.oracle_text: Choose land or nonland. Reveal cards from the top of your library until you reveal a card of the chosen kind. Put that card into your hand and the rest on the bottom of your library in a random order.

sideboard.oracle_text:
You may look at the top card of your library any time.
